subject: Escalation: Unit Test Fix Task - Recurring Context Limits

content.issue: The unit test fix task (67+ failures) has failed 3 times due to context limits
content.analysis: Task is too large for single worker context. Workers exceed 200k token limit while analyzing test files and errors.
content.recommendation: Break into smaller focused tasks: modal tests, service tests, remaining tests, integration verification
content.impact: Conditional passes issued for audit stories - not blocking audit progress but affects validation accuracy
content.action_requested: Approve decomposition strategy or provide alternative approach
